sentences.sentence: There are certain relation between shame-proneness and self-esteem and locus of control.
sentences.translation: 羞耻倾向与自尊和心理控制源倾向之间存在有意义的关系。

sentences.sentence: The evaluation of geohazard emergence (its proneness) is an important mission in research and evaluation of geohazard.
